title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same capabilities as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that plugs into your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for chatting and generating with Ollama models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Production-grade Docker Compose stack with Ollama, GPU support, and observability.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Kubernetes Helm chart for deploying Ollama with autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models (macOS/Linux/Windows).

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app for private or channel-based conversations with Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside your vault for summarization and brainstorming.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official NPM package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for Ollama.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for interacting with Ollama from Python.

title: r/ollama - Local LLM ecosystem discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tools, models, and troubleshooting Ollama integrations.
